topic.title: Content Reference Tests
topic.shortdesc: Tests that exercise various forms of content reference.

body.p:
Content reference features include:
Direct URI references (conref)
Key reference (conkeyref)
Conref push (pushing content into topics)
Referencing ranges

In addition, the DITA 1.3 "this topic" fragment identifier has implications when used within referenced content or used within a topic that references content. Tests for "this topic" fragment identifiers are in the this-topic-fragment-ids test cases.
